project_name: UPM-2781667 - 100 Gough Road, Markham - Desjardins MF Refresh 2022
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):rejected by Sebastian Vandervort (3):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Installation of power and cut tiles for New MainFrame on behalf of Kyndryl client - Desjardins, on the first floor data center.
scope_of_work.scope:
1. We need to energize 4x 60A existing circuits under the raised floor, approx. location of staging area - X048Y052. No cabinet grounding required as it's a temporary location, for staging only. After staging is completed. 2a. X056Y043 - we will need to disconnect the power from this cabinet. 2b. disconnect the 4 x 60a circuits from staging cabinets, X048Y052. Relocate/Move 2 x 60a circuits from staging cabinets/area over to X056Y043. 2c. There will be 4 x 60a circuits there, X056Y043, that we will need energized. 3. Re-energize 4 x 60a circuits in the staging area again after we move the 2nd new M/F there. No cabinet grounding required as it's a temporary location, for staging only. After staging is completed. 3b. Disconnect 4 x 60a circuits from staging. 3c. Relocate/move 2 x 60a circuits from staging over to X056Y051 location. 3d. Connect 4 x 60a circuits to new MF cabinets and complete install ( ie. cabinet grounding ) We will require 4 center cut tiles for this installation.
*cut tiles and grounding material to be utilized from site stock
scope_of_work.justification: Client, Desjardins mainframe refresh project as existing MF is coming to EOL. No support will be provided when equipment comes to end of life and major impact to client could occur.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: No support will be provided when equipment comes to end of life and major impact to client could occur.

status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Maureen Gerlach (2):offer submitted by Maureen Gerlach

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: The leveling of several floor tiles and the repair of several defects.
scope_of_work.scope:
- Repair with reconstec
- Reattach the foot scraper grid
- Concrete repair
- Redo the joints between the stones
- Replace the identified stones
scope_of_work.justification:
The following defects were noted at the main entrance (stairs and floor
- Floor tiles not at the same level.
- Cracks and detachment of floor tiles
- Cracks in tile joints
- Concrete cracks
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: - There are risks for employees to collide with obstacles and trip over unleveled stones.

project_name: UPM-2785953 - 275 Viger, Montreal - Inspection complète de la toiture
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Maureen Gerlach (2):work order closed by Maureen Gerlach (3):work planning by Maureen Gerlach (4):offer approved by Maureen Gerlach (5):offer submitted by Maureen Gerlach

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Inspection of the roof by thermography and other instrumentation to detect any problems related to it.
scope_of_work.scope: With the help of different instruments, make a complete analysis of the roof to detect problems with waterproofing and water infiltration. This may result in work following this analysis.
scope_of_work.justification: Inspection necessary to avoid problems with sealing and water infiltration. Recently, there have been heavy rains that have caused water infiltration in some places.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: If this inspection is not carried out, there is a great possibility that roofing problems will not be detected in a timely manner and that could cause bigger problems in the long term.

project_name: UPM-2786255 - 245 Consumers Road Toronto -  Desjardins temporary 2023 Occupancy Consumers Road
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):rejected by Sebastian Vandervort (3):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Includes 40% contingency of Total Cost
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem:
Desjardin has requested floor space at Consumers Rd to accommodate 43 Cabinets at 3 to 5 KW per cabinet . ( Total 210 KW )
A Budgetary quote is require for Power whip install , tile cuts . etc.
-86 Whips & Breakers
-43 Tile cuts
-15 perforated tiles
-Customer does not require designated RPP’s , shared power is acceptable .
-Goal to reuse whips and cut tile etc. where ever possible .
- No Cage wall. No security changes or enhancements .
- Time frame / lead times required to complete required .
- Solution can not over load RPP’s
scope_of_work.scope:
Please refer to attachments for more details
The Desjardin’s account team would like to have a budgetary quote for the customer by tomorrow . Please add contingency if require .

High level break down assumption :
- 86 breakers compatible with L15-30
- 86 power whips approx. 100 feet length with L15-30R ( receptacles )
- 43 Tile cuts . ( reuse / inventory where possible)
- 15 perforated tile . ( reuse / inventory where possible)
- Labour
- Lead time require .

Connecting whips and breakers to RPP is after hours activity .
Running power whips can be done during day .
Lead time require .
Please refer to attachment for more details
scope_of_work.justification: New Business Growth
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: SLA's / penalties
